name: Abolee Tower Fan, 23ft/s Desk Fan, 70° Oscillating Table Fan for Bedroom, Standing Table Fan with 3 Modes, 2024 New 13 Inch Bladeless fan for Bedroom, Home,Office
short_description: 【Customizable Cooling】 Experience personalized comfort with our compact tower fan featuring efficient turbine blades. Adjust to up to 23ft/s wind speeds and three settings to tailor your cooling experience, making it a versatile choice for any small space. 【Portable and Powerful】 This portable fan offers 70° wide-angle oscillation for extensive coverage. Its compact, 13-inch design allows you to enjoy a cool, comfortable environment anywhere, perfect for use as a table fan or when traveling. 【Whisper-Quiet Operation】 Keep your space cool without the noise. Operating below 29dB, our tower fan offers a refreshing breeze, ideal for use as a personal fan in bedrooms, living rooms, and offices. 【Effortless Comfort Control】 This desk fan allows for easy airflow adjustments with a simple twist of a knob. Ideal for use at your desk or across the room, its oscillating feature helps you beat the heat and stay comfortable. 【Energy Efficient】 Reduce your electric bills with our energy-efficient cooling fan. It comes fully assembled and ready to operate as a standing fan, ensuring maximum efficiency and minimal fuss in any setting.

name: Lasko Oscillating Pedestal Fan - Lasko Fan with Adjustable Height and 3 Cooling Speeds, Portable, 18", White, 1820
short_description: ADJUSTABLE HEIGHT: This fan's height is adjustable from 38"-54.5"; the tilt control allows you to direct the cooling airflow of this stand up fan as a standing fan for bedroom or an oscillating fan THREE SPEED OPTIONS: Choose from 3 energy-efficient speeds to adjust the airflow of this cooling fan in your living room, as a bedroom fan, or as a fan for room OSCILLATING FAN: This Lasko fan features 60-degree oscillation; this oscillating fan works well as a standing fan for bedroom or a living room fan SAFETY FIRST: This ETL listed stand fan is equipped with Lasko's safety fuse technology and a BLUE Plug. This electric fan is a useful cooling fan throughout the home SIMPLE SETUP: This 11.3-pound stand fan requires no tools for assembly; it is a portable fan for room you can use as a bedroom fan, living room fan, or other indoor fan
product_description: The Lasko Oscillating Pedestal Fan in white is a standing fan for room cooling that provides reliable cooling. Ideal as a living room fan, this rotating fan features an 18-inch blade with 3 energy-efficient speeds to move cooling airflow in larger spaces. Its adjustable height ranges from 38" to 54.5", making it an excellent stand fan for bedroom or home office use, and its tilting head allows you to direct cooling airflow to where it is needed. With a 60-degree oscillation, this fan delivers widespread air circulation. Lightweight and portable, this white fan is easy to move from the bedroom to the living room or any other area in your home, promoting air circulation wherever you need it. Assembly is a breeze with no tools required. This Lasko fan features an ETL-listed design, safety fuse technology, and BLUE Plug technology. This versatile pedestal fan by Lasko is designed to keep you and your family comfortable.

name: Dreo Tower Fan for Bedroom, 90° Oscillating Standing Fans for Room with 4 Speeds, 3 Modes, 28dB Quiet for Sleep, 25ft/s Velocity, 8H Timer, Remote, Living Room, Office, Home, Black, TF117
short_description: 𝑷𝒐𝒘𝒆𝒓𝒇𝒖𝒍 𝒂𝒊𝒓𝒇𝒍𝒐𝒘 𝒇𝒐𝒓 𝒇𝒂𝒔𝒕 𝒄𝒐𝒎𝒇𝒐𝒓𝒕: With a 25ft/s air speed, this tower fan blows cold air, providing refreshing breezes to chill your space quickly. Lightweight and portable, it fits perfectly in small or large rooms for easy cooling. 𝑩𝒓𝒆𝒆𝒛𝒆 𝒂𝒕 𝒀𝒐𝒖𝒓 𝑪𝒐𝒎𝒎𝒂𝒏𝒅: Enjoy 90° of smooth oscillation, 3 modes (Normal, Sleep, Natural), and 4 speed settings. name: DR.PREPARE Tower Fan for Bedroom, 25 dB Quiet DC Bladeless Fan with Remote, 8 Speeds, 1-8H Timer, 80° Oscillating Fans for Indoors, 16 Inch Portable Desk Table Fans for Room, Home, Office
short_description: [12W Powerful DC Motor] Efficient DC motor delivers powerful cool winds to your living space. Up to 2000 RPM and 23 ft/s wind speed will cool you off instantly. Get your desired wind speed with ease - 8 speeds for your choice! [Near Silent Cooling] Engineered for ultra-quiet cooling and high wind speeds. As low as 25 dB, this tower fan brings maximum comfort for your sound sleep, without unpleasant noise. Outperforming AC motors, DC motors produce quiet cooling even after long periods of work. [Convenient Touchscreen & Remote Control] The upper control panel and smart remote controller make this table fan easy to use. You can set wind speeds, auto-off hours, oscillation, sound / sleep mode, and turn on/off the tower fan from the comfort of your couch or bed. [1-8 Hours Timer & 80° Oscillation] User-friendly timer with the 1-hour progressive setting. Set the timer with the control panel or the remote controller. Press the SWING button to enjoy the sweeping airflow around your room. [Easy to Clean] Detachable impeller wheel and rear guard. Clean this desk fan regularly for long-term refreshing coolness. For any questions or concerns about this tower fan, please feel free to contact us.

name: Winado 36" Tower Fan for Bedroom, Bladeless Floor Fan with Remote Control, Digital Display, Adjustable Oscillating, 3 Speeds, 3 Modes & 9H Timer, Bladeless Quiet Fan for Cooling Home Office
short_description: 【Simple Control】This tower fan supports sensitive touch, more intuitive operation. In addition, no need to get up, sit on the sofa or bed to adjust the wind speed and mode, and enjoy a comfortable experience. The remote control can be attached to the side of the body to avoid loss and can be used anytime! 【3 Speeds & 3 Modes】The wind speed can be freely adjusted, supporting low, medium and high options to meet the cooling needs in different environments. There are also 3 modes of natural, sleeping and normal wind to simulate the real wind feeling, making it more comfortable to sleep in the summer night and more powerful to cool down during the day. 【9H Timing Function】Built-in 12-hour adjustable timer, no need for frequent operation, easy to set the on or off time, energy saving and power saving is more considerate. Especially suitable for sleeping at night or setting before going out, so that you can enjoy the coolness when you return home, and you don’t have to worry about forgetting to turn off. 【High-performance Motor】Adopting high-efficiency all-copper motor, it has strong power and higher stability, continuous air supply without lag, and is durable. The noise level is 25dB during operation, which is suitable for use in bedrooms, baby rooms or offices, allowing you to quietly enjoy every moment of coolness. 【Modern Appearance Design】The simple and stylish tower appearance saves space and is suitable for a variety of home styles. The plastic body design is lighter and less conductive, with a high protection level, suitable for families with elderly and children. The base is stable and anti-dumping, making it safer to use.

name: Dreo Tower Fan for Bedroom, 90° Oscillating Standing Fan, 30ft far, 28dB Quiet for Sleep, 6 Speeds, 4 Modes, 12H Timer, 42 Inch, Bladeless, Remote, for Home, Office, Room, Cruiser Pro T1
short_description: Quiet at All Speeds: Better cool begins with quieter sound. Acoustically designed airflow system hugely reduces noises from motor and fan. This fan for bedroom also adopts hyper-precision bearing to provide ultra quiet cooling at all speeds. Max Out the Winds: Drawing from back and sides, this Dreo fan brings out more air. Built-in motor spins up to 1350RPM to provide cooling up to 30 feet far, so you finally can say goodbye to sweltering summer days. More Speeds to Your Needs: From soft breezes to strong winds, this oscillating fan offers 6 speed levels to cool your body and soothe your mind whenever you need it. Along with 4 modes (Sleep/Auto/Natural/Normal) to give you more personalized cooling. Cool that Sweeps Around: With a 530 mm extended fan wheel, this tower fan blows out more air at one time, along with ultra wide 90° osicllation to cover every corner of your living space. Into the Peaceful World: Designed to tune out the noise and distractions from the standing fan so you can be with just yourself and peaceful comfort. In Sleep mode, display turns mute and off in 15 sec to give you the complete peace, day and night. Save as You Cool: This Dreo bladeless fan circulates the air around the room with less energy thanks to its fine-tuned airflow system. Combine with your air conditioner to get your room cool in the shortest time.

name: Dreo Fan for Bedroom, 120° Oscillating Standing Fans,Quiet Floor Fan with DC Motor, 85ft Pedestal Fans for Room,8 Speeds, 3 modes, 20dB, 120° Manual Vertical, 35-40" Adjustable Height, 8H Timer,Grey
short_description: 𝑶𝒏𝒆 𝑭𝒂𝒏, 𝑴𝒖𝒍𝒕𝒊𝒑𝒍𝒆 𝑭𝒖𝒏𝒄𝒕𝒊𝒐𝒏𝒔: From circulating air around, to quiet powerful cooling, Dreo PolyFan for bedroom combines a pedestal fan, an oscillating fan, and an air circulator into one, which adapts greatly to all your needs. Don't get confused by its shape, the 8 wind speeds and 3 modes of the Dreo standing fan do much more than a fan. (13.07"D x 7.28"W x 39.29"H) 𝑺𝒖𝒓𝒓𝒐𝒖𝒏𝒅 𝑨𝒊𝒓 𝑪𝒊𝒓𝒄𝒖𝒍𝒂𝒕𝒊𝒐𝒏 𝒇𝒐𝒓 𝑾𝒉𝒐𝒍𝒆 𝑹𝒐𝒐𝒎: Feel it wherever you are, the air booster and bionic blade design makes the floor fan as far as 85 ft away while being incredibly quiet. Making it ideal for home, bedrooms, offices, living rooms and any place that needs powerful indoor air circulation. 𝑼𝒍𝒕𝒓𝒂-𝒘𝒊𝒅𝒆 𝑶𝒔𝒄𝒊𝒍𝒍𝒂𝒕𝒊𝒐𝒏: Experiment with 120° vertical tilt and 120˚ horizontal oscillation to cover every corner of the room. Vertical tilt requires manual operation and horizontal oscillation can be controlled by remote and panel. Even if this room fan is used in the bedroom, it will not affect the air blowing to the bed. The large LED display and remote control make it intuitive and convenient to control the oscillation angles and modes even from far away. 𝑼𝒍𝒕𝒓𝒂 𝑸𝒖𝒊𝒆𝒕 𝑫𝑪 𝑴𝒐𝒕𝒐𝒓: Don't sacrifice performance for quietness, it reduces noise down to 20dB, making it the ideal quiet fan for bedtime or working without distractions. Thanks to the DREO brushless DC motor combined with turbine style blade technology, it circulates the air quickly throughout the room. And the DC motor produces 30% more air using 40% less energy. 𝑬𝒂𝒔𝒚 𝒕𝒐 𝑪𝒍𝒆𝒂𝒏, 𝑴𝒐𝒓𝒆 𝒕𝒐 𝑬𝒏𝒋𝒐𝒚: Featuring adjustable height (35-40"), 8H timers, and straightforward installation and cleaning, every aspect of the stand up fan for home bedroom experience fits into your lifestyle.

name: Dreo Tower Fan for Bedroom, Upgraded DC 9 Speeds Ultra-Quiet Floor Fan, 90° Oscillating Fans for Indoors with 28ft/s Velocity, 12H Timer, Standing Fans, Bladeless Fan Powerful for Home Office Room

name: Holmes 31" Manual Tower Fan, 70° Oscillation, 3 Speeds, 2-Hour Auto Shut-Off Timer, Adjustable Vents, Compact and Slim Profile, Carry Handle, Ideal for Cooling your Home, Bedroom or Office, Black
short_description: EASY-TO-USE - Simple manual control knobs to operate your tower fan FEEL THE BREEZE - 3 customized speed settings for your optimal airflow; low, medium and high 2-HOUR AUTO SHUT-OFF TIMER - Easily set the length of time your tower fan will run before automatically shutting off, up to 2-hours in length WIDE-ANGLE OSCILLATION - Motorized 70° oscillation offers wide sweeping back and forth movement to cool larger living areas ADJUSTABLE AIRFLOW - Unique adjustable vent design allows you to direct airflow upward and downwards for where you need it most INTEGRATED CARRY HANDLE - This lightweight tower fan has a built-in carry handle to easily transport from one room to the next QUIET OPERATION - Only 58 decibels on the strongest speed setting
product_description: Holmes 31” Manual Tower Fan makes cooling your home a breeze. Features simple manual control knobs to easily operate the fan and adjust the settings. Small but powerful, it has 3 speed options, low, medium and high, and motorized 70° oscillation to deliver cool airflow for wider areas. Move the adjustable vents up and down for an even further customized cooling experience. This slim, compact tower fan is ideal for living areas where floor space is limited, including bedrooms, kitchens, living rooms and home offices, and has an integrated carry handle to go from one room to the next. Rest easy knowing there is an up to 2-hour auto shut-off timer to conveniently turn off the tower fan. This modern fan features a sturdy base, black finish and 3-year limited warranty.
